source: Embassy of Japan in India / VFS Global

visa.name: Japan Tourist Visa (Single Entry)

processingDays.note: Business days. Peak season (cherry blossom/autumn) may take longer.

cost.note: Government fee ~3,000 JPY converted. VFS service charge applies.

documentsRequired: Valid passport (6+ months validity, 2 blank pages)
Recent passport-size photo (4.5cm x 4.5cm, white background)
Cover letter explaining purpose of visit
notes: Japan does not offer e-visa for Indian nationals
Multiple entry visas available for frequent travelers with good travel history
Transit visa not required if staying in international zone under 24 hours

stayLimits.extensionProcess: Apply at Immigration Bureau in Japan before visa expires

flights.note: Round-trip from major Indian metros. Book 6-8 weeks ahead for best prices.

tips: Apply at least 2-3 weeks before travel to account for processing delays
Cherry blossom season (late March-early April) sees higher visa volumes
Keep all original documents - photocopies may not be accepted
JR Pass must be purchased before arriving in Japan
Cash is still widely used - carry JPY
